item.title: Understanding the Evolving Threat of DDoS Attacks in 2024
item.description:
You can access the full report here Microsoft Digital Defense Report 2024
The Rise of Network and Application Layer Attacks Beginning in mid-March 2024, there was a noticeable rise in network DDoS attacks, peaking at approximately 4,500 attacks per day by June. These attacks primarily targeted medium-sized applications, with a significant shift towards application layer attacks. Unlike traditional network-level attacks, application layer attacks are more stealthy, sophisticated, and difficult to mitigate.
